forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low near 40F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 9C. E winds shifting to SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 49F. E winds shifting to SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 3C. WSW winds shifting to SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 39F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 7C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. High near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low near 40F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.
